content:
Hi!

Do you want us to write raw code for each part of the code or can we use functions like split(), set(), etc?
subject: Can we use a built in function in a pset?

content:
<md>You can use many common built-in functions, yes.
, **`str.lower(), split, str.isalpha(), set`**, etc.

If there is anything very specific and in relation to a specific problem set, feel free to ask as well.</md>
